component.name: DistroRack
DistroRack
component.summary: A Qt6-based GUI for managing Distrobox containers
基于 Qt6 的 Distrobox 容器管理图形界面

description.p: DistroRack is a modern Qt6-based graphical user interface for managing Distrobox containers. It provides an intuitive way to create, manage, and interact with containerized Linux distributions.

ul.li: Create and manage multiple Distrobox containers

description.p: This release fixes the following bug:

ul.li: Ensure refresh action also update the distro details UI

description.p: This release includes the following changes:

ul.li: Make UI look more sane under non-DDE platforms (mainly KDE)
Add QML depends for CPack DEB generator

description.p: This release adds the following features:

ul.li: Ability to export/unexport applications inside a container
Support set and use custom terminal emulators
